Configuration/python/sample_plotter.py

00001 #!/usr/bin/python
00002 
00003 from LDMX.Framework import ldmxcfg;
00004 
00005 p=ldmxcfg.Process("plot")
00006 
00007 testplot=ldmxcfg.Analyzer("testplot", "ldmx::DummyAnalyzer")
00008 
00009 testplot.parameters["caloHitCollection"]="hcalDigis"
00010 
00011 p.sequence=[testplot]
00012 p.inputFiles=["ldmx_digi_events.root"]
00013 p.maxEvents=50
00014 p.histogramFile="histo.root"
00015 
00016 p.printMe()
